page.title: 08A CHILD ON HILLHEAD FARM.
page.content: Living on a farm has it's{advantages and it's{disadvantages.}There's no hustle bustle of the city traffic so you can imagine how peaceful it is.You have more freedom and more places to play.You have plenty of places to grow vegetables and if you have cattle you can get plenty of meat.If you are interested in nature it is an excellent place to live because this particular farm has lots of woodland so it is bound to have nature.But living on a farm is not all easy as there are some setbacks.You don't have friends round all the time and you have to arrange for them to come and play with you.But you can't play all the time.There is always a lot of work to do whether you want to or not.Some work like driving the tractor is good fun but other work like picking potatoes is not quite as good fun.
